definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: He needs the specific dates their componets orders were placed last month.
sentences.chinese: 他要他們上個月提出的機件訂單的詳細日期。

sentences.english: When she was arrested at Notre Dame last month, he was right beside her.
sentences.chinese: 當她上個月在聖母大學被捕後，特里一直陪伴着她。

sentences.english: Last month I talked about how to write a device driver for radio-tuner cards.
sentences.chinese: 上個月我講述了怎樣爲音頻接收卡編寫設備驅動。

sentences.english: Low water levels caused the country's largest hydropower dam to be shut down last month.
sentences.chinese: 上個月，低水位使得肯尼亞最大的水力大壩被迫關閉。

sentences.english: I mean, in this last month, things have changed.
sentences.chinese: 因爲上個月變革開始了。

sentences.english: Zhaolan was married to an actor last month.
sentences.chinese: 上個月趙蘭和一個演員結婚了。

sentences.english: That includes Shell, its chief executive said last month.
sentences.chinese: 這其中包括殼牌，其行政長官上個月說。

sentences.english: The little penguin was born last month - and was instantly ill-treated by its parents.
sentences.chinese: 這隻小企鵝是在上個月出生的，剛落地就遭父母虐待。

sentences.english: After that, we went to a local garment shop, the one just opened last month.
sentences.chinese: 那之後，我們去了一家上個月剛開張的衣店。

sentences.english: They moved to Dallas two years ago and returned last month.
sentences.chinese: 他們兩年前搬到達拉斯，上個月又搬回來了。

sentences.english: Again? We just had it serviced last month.
sentences.chinese: 又壞了？我們上個月纔拿去修過。

sentences.english: I know that some readers had problems downloading the source code last month.
sentences.chinese: 我知道上個月有些讀者在下載源代碼時遇到了問題。

sentences.english: Describe what you have done in the last month to keep up-to-date on new products.
sentences.chinese: 上個月您做了什麼更新自己對新產品的知識？

sentences.english: She was supposed to get married last month but she got cold feet.
sentences.chinese: 她本應該上個月結婚的，但她又打了退堂鼓。

sentences.english: Last month, I went to Guilin and Yangshuo by train for my holiday.
sentences.chinese: 上個月放假自己坐火車去了一趟桂林和陽朔遊玩。

sentences.english: The building was to have been completed by the end of last month, but the plan failed.
sentences.chinese: 這棟樓本來計劃上個月底建完，但計劃失敗了。

definition: outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
